hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t.OBJECT_NAME,t.OBJECT_ID from user_objects t where object_type='TABLE' <if isNotBlank(keyword)> and t.OBJECT_NAME like '%' || :keyword || '%' </if> <if isNotBlank(tableName)> or t.OBJECT_NAME = :tableName </if>
select t.OBJECT_NAME,t.OBJECT_ID from user_objects t where object_type='VIEW'

select t.COLUMN_NAME,t.DATA_TYPE,nvl(c.COMMENTS,t.COLUMN_NAME) as COMMENTS from user_tab_columns t left join user_col_comments c on c.TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME and c.COLUMN_NAME= t.COLUMN_NAME where t.TABLE_NAME = :tableName
